name: Cube Dash: Endless Run
description:
Cube Dash: Endless Run is an endless runner that offers skillful and visually pleasing experience to this genre. Dash into the world in which every run is unique! As you venture on your journey, you'll encounter various obstacles that will get in your way. The further you go the harder it gets.

-Compete with other players and see who can travel the furthest.
-Collect different outfits that have their own unique styles and effects!
-Complete various challenges.
-Master the controls and timing to beat the hardest parts of your runs.

You can follow my further progress via Twitter
